div.p:
Curia tenta in pretorio burgi de abirdene per balliuos eiusdem quinto die octobris
anno Dominj et cetera lxxxij

quo die precipitur Johanni vaus per balliuos ex confessione propria
ad satisfaciendum Dauid Duncanj xvj s' in quibus sibi tenetur pro precio vnius barelle
bituminis alias optent' super eundem infra terminum Juris

Eodem die Robertus Dowgale fatebatur se satisfacere thome gardner de ix vlnis
pannj albi le carsay aut precio eiusdem infra quindenam / plegio manu propria extensa Duncano
straloch' seriendo

the samyn day Wil sprunt baxtar conuict be ane assise was adiugit in amerciament for
breking of the assise and common' ordinance of the pais' of brede and til forber' in tym tocum

Item the said day it was decretit and ordanit be the aldirman and consale that thomas
prat sal pay for Janet Wormot in hir absence xxij s' iij d' ob' for a termys mail
of a thrid part of the pot acht be hir to the toun' before his entre with hir
wattir and the said some' tobe allowit to the said thomas in the erast commpt
and rekning betuix thaim
Curia tenta per balliuos burgi de abirdene in pretorio eiusdem vijo die mensis octobris predicti

quo die margreta cadiou Katerina Kintor et ada cadiou vxor alexandri logy accusate
et conuicte per confessiones proprias pro infrictione precij impositi super ceruisiam venalem per gusta
tores eiusdem ipsarum quelibet adiudicatur in amerciamento curie

vxor Johannis fichet litstar in amerciamento per concessionem propriam pro vendicione ceruisie pro xij d' vb
appreciate fuit pro viij d'

Eodem die decretum fuit per curiam et datum pro Judicio per os thome talyour Judicatorum
curie quod Willelmus de Kintor procuratorio nomine patris suj deuenit ad clameum suum
contra / et aduersus Johannem smyth de vna barella salmonum causa non defensa pro eo
quod ista curia fuit pro die peremptorio eidem assignata et non comparuit / licet fuerat
ad hoc sepe vocatus . Et quod satisfacere tenetur dictam barellam salmonum infra terminum Juris

vxor Johannis sincler' et vxor Duncanj lundoris conuicte per assisam amerciantur pro communis
statuti infrictione in propinacione ceruisie xij denariorum

The samyn dai It is fundin be a sworn assise alexander rede forspekar of the samyn
anent the clame of xxiij li' of ane obligacion made be Dauid hil til John
of lambynton' / that the said Dauid hil has ratifiit and approvit the first
gacion made and selit with his Seil to the said John' and has annullit
last condicion and poyntment made anent the payment of the said some' / And
becaus' the said Dauid allegit payment of the said some' made to Cor
nelus bugil factour and merchand to the said John' in brugis in flaundris
the said assise Riply avisit the said excepcion and allegacion beand herd / has
deliuerit / that the said Dauid betuix this and Witsonday next tocum sal bring ane
sufficient certificacion and document of the payment of the said some' made to the
said cornelus in the name and the behalf of the said John' And falyeand tharof
be the forsaid day The said Dauid hil sal content and pay to the said John'
of lambynton' his ayris executouris or assignais the said some of xxiij li'
within xv daies next eftir the said Witsonday but ony langar dilay excepcion
or process' of law / al excepcionis and dilatouris excludit vtirly and away put

The samen day the said assise has deliuerit that canne fergus' Janet chamer and canny
rothy personaris and ressauaris of the malt the quhilk mage scherar' bocht fra
a man of the lard of Johnestonis / salpay ilkane of thaim thare part in quhite
siluer eftir the tenour of the first act and sal releve hir tharof and mak payment
as scho dois to the principal dettour

Item the said day the ballies has chargit John' fichet schipman be his awne
graunt tocontent and pay til thomas atkynson' in Durno or til his procuratour
James cuming the some' of xix s' iiijor d' within terme of law for the quhilk some'
Duncan straloch seriand distressit of before and leit the poynd to borch et cetera

The assise has determynit that gilbert morison' is dettour of the mail of a thrid part
of the pot acht to the toune the quhilk he allegit Dauy spens' suld had payt

Item gilbert of chamer is ordanit be the assise topay j merk of the rest of his
wattir mail acht to the toun

the videu of adam cardny is adiugit be the assise topay demj mark of annuale
acht til maistir thomas stane

Eodem die post merediem coram preposito et diuersis de consulibus in pretorio Donaldus ioffrason'
inuenit alexandrum rede plegium legalem quod Dauid galichtly erit indempnis de eo et parte
sua aliter quam per viam Juris Et eodemmodo Willelmus blindsele deuenit plegius pro dicto Dauid
de indempnitate prefati Donaldi et cetera

Et quia Reperiebatur quod Donaldus ioffrasone iniuste perturbavit Dauid galychtly per confessionem propriam
extrahendo cultellum ad percutiendum eum / ante inuencionem plegiorum legalium Iniungitur eidem
per prepositum quod ammodo non committat talem perturbacionem contra dictum Dauid aut quemcumque alium vicinorum
huius burgi sub pena xl solidorum leuand' de eodem ad voluntatem prepositi et applicandum
ad fabricam ecclesie beati nicholai eiusdem burgi
Curia tenta in pretorio burgi de abirdene per ballivos eiusdem viijo die octobris anno et cetera lxxxij

The samyn dai it is fundin and deliuerit be a sworn assise William blindsel forspekar of the samen
that James of Kyntor aw tomak payment til thom prat of ellevin pundis of a mare
sowme contenit in ane obligacion made tharupon to the said thomas within lachful tyme

Edmond the hay conuict be the said assise is adiugit in amerciament of the wrangwis' ta
king of a quart fra John symsonis servand and til restore the quart as law wil

margret the wif of androw goldsmyth in amerciament for the breking of common ordinance of the price
put apon the ail selland for xij d'

Item becaus' the assise fand that Anton' hatmakar bure him nocht sa honestly nor sa obedient
ly to the officeris as he suld haf done / thai haf ordanit / that gif in tyme tocum it be
fundin that the said Anton offend til ony officer' of this burgh this yere' / that he sal pay
xl s' to the kirk wark vnforgevin

The assise findis and deliueris that James of Kyntor suld mak payment of his wattir mail
acht to the toune

the aldirman and balyeis has chargit archibald monylawis tomak service til henry
bawne quhil he be content and assithit of v s' vj d' adiugit til him be certan arbitrouris

Edmundus hay inuenit Willelmum blindsele plegium legalem pro eo de indempnitate Johannis symson aliter quam per viam Juris
et andreas ancroft deuenit plegium pro dicto Johanne quam edmundus hay erit indempnis vt supra

In curia tenta in pretorio de abirdene per ballivos eiusdem ixo die octobris predicti Agnes fichet sponsa
thome vaus constituit gilbertum vaus et andream Wentoun suos procuratores coniunctim et divisim in causa
mota per eam contra et aduersus vxorem thome Willelmi lip et certas alias personas Et promisit de rato et cetera

the same dai the aldirman and balyeis assignit til Dauid Kintor monondai next tocum
peremptourly / til answer' and vndirly the law at the instance of James cuming for the wrang
wis' occupacion of a thrid part of the pot wattir and withhalding of the fisching and profitis
of the samyn

It is ordanit be the aldirman and consale with consent of gilbert chamer that John Wormot
is cumin ful dettour til ser Androw Wrycht maistir of the kirk wark for four' merkis of mail
of the Witsonday terme bigane of the thrid part of a net of Done quhilk Duncan
smyth had in tak of gilbert chamer forsaid and the said gilbert has drawin his thrid
part of a net of Done til the aldirman be his hand til free the said John Wormot
of the said four' merkis / And Duncan smyth sal ansuer' to the said gilbert as law wil
for twa barellis of salmond acht to the said gilbert as he allegis within twa
daies eftir his hame cuming / And gif it beis fundin that the forsaid Duncan be aw
and to the said gilbert the forsaid twa barellis of salmond / than the said Duncan
sal pay to the forsaid gilbert alsmekle siluer for ilke barel as ony fisch gaf in
abirdene for this yer'

xjo die octobris anno et cetera lxxxij Alexander marr' constituit macolmum lesly procuratorem suum in absencia
eius ad prosequendum legittime Willelmum philp de iniusta detencione xx s' eidem ut asserit assignat'
de quadam taxa et cetera et in aliis causis ipsum concernentibus in latissima forma procuratorie

the samen dai anent the clame and debate of a certane of blew wol a quhele j coveryn the
quhilk Wil lippis wif ressauit fra thom the vaus' wif in ald abirdene et j sek is resp
latit quhil monondai next tocum / and that day the intromettouris of the said gudis salbring
thare warrand and the party folowar sal bring thare witnes toprofe the said gudis thom
the vaus' wifis

Eodem die Willelmus philp accusatus de foristallacione huius burgi posuit se in voluntate prepositi emen
daturus iuxta ordinacionem ipsius et communis consilij

Item eodem die Dauid ogstoun comparens coram ballivis in Judicio optulit se responsurus ad calumpniam
Willelmi buchan qui porrexit plegium super eum de iniusta detencione vnius bolle frumenti et non comparuit ad prose
quendum dictum plegium / quare protestatus fuit pro dampnis suis et expensis / et quod ammodo non audiatur
contra eum donec nouiter fuerit attachiatus

The same dai It wes fundin be ane assise that Androw ramsais wif sal pay and deliuer
til William blindsel for four' bollis of malt and thre firlotis for ilke bol xij s' / he
payand and allowand in the said some' for the making of xij bollis of bere and j f'
alsmekil as nychbur' and vthir giffis and pais for the making of samekil beir

Johannes pawdy et vxor eius conuicti per assisam amerciatur pro iniusta perturbacione Jonete rate
et eadem Joneta amerciamento quia perturbavit vxorem dicti Johannis

xijo die mensis octobris predicti / Willelmus Dauyson conuictus fuit per assisam pro iniusta foris
tallacione lane et pellium et quitus de residuo

Curia legalis tenta in pretorio burgi de abirdene per balliuos eiusdem xiiijto die
octobris anno Dominj et cetera lxxxij

Inquisicio Alexander rede Johannes Wormot thomas prat Willelmus hay adam de
craufurd andreas Kympty Dauid Kyntor matheus culan gilbertus morison'
Willelmus de garuiach Johannes glenmalvin Willelmus de tulidef andreas atkyn alexander
sanchar' et Robertus buchan Quj Jurati dicunt quod quondam Willelmus lausoun auun
culus magistri gilberti lausoun latoris presencium obiit vltimo vestitus et sasitus ut de
feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri Regis de vna terra sine tenemento cum pertinencijs Jacente
infra burgum abirdene in vico furcarum ex parte occidentali eiusdem vici inter terram Johannis
gregory ex parte australi et terram quondam andree baxtar ex parte boriali et communem
viam regiam ex orientali parte et lacum dicti burgi ex occidentali parte Et quod dictus magister
gilbertus est legittimus et propinquior heres eiusdem quondam Willelmi auunculi suj de dicta
terra cum pertinenciis racione tallie / et est legittime etatis Et quod dicta terra cum pertinenciis valet nunc per annum
x s' et tantum valuit tempore pacis / et quod tenetur in capite de domino nostro Rege per seruicium
burgale Et quod nunc existit in manibus eiusdem dominj Regis legittime per se ipsum a tempore
obitus alicie Relicte quondam dicti Willelmi lauson / que habuit coniunctam infeodacionem
dicte terre cum pertinenciis per spacium duorum mensium vel eocirca In defectu veri heredis Jus
suum minime prosequentis

Eodem die andreas louson' prosecutus fuit per plegium alexandrum richardson' de iniusta
detencione xxiiij solidorum ad eodem quj quidem alexander allegavit se soluisse dictam pecuniam
et ad provandum solucionem eiusdem ballivi assignauerunt eidem hodie ad octo dies peremptorie
In qua probacione si tunc deficerit statim condempnabatur in dicta summa soluenda dicto andree
infra terminum Juris

Item eidem die Johannes low super quem Willelmus blindsele inuenit plegium pro iniusta detencione l solidorum ab
eodem racione certe taxe sibi assignat' et cetera primo die vocatus ad respondendum dicto plegio non comparuit
Ideo precipitur Duncano straloch seriendo capere districtum et cetera et premunire eundem Johannem
ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam secundum diem huius processus

the xv day of october yer' et cetera lxxxij It wes fundin and deliuerit be ane sworn assise
that Wil of lynton' Richart falconer Donald leilman and alexander riny quhilkis bocht ail
fra anne the spous' of fergus blithe sal pay ilkane of thaim thare part in
quhite siluer to the said Anne / becaus' that the blak money gevin tharfor was on
thurisday eftir the downe crying of the samyn quhilk suld stand in na payment

xvij die octobris thomas prat deuenit plegium legalem pro Johanne sandirson magistro cuiusdam na
uis vocate erasmus de swethin quod Johannes Daw magister nauis de leith et
pars sua erunt indempnes de eo et parte sua aliter quam per viam Juris

Et dictus Johannes Daw inuenit andream Kimdy plegium legalem quod dictus Johannes
sandirson et pars sua erunt indempnes de eo et parte sua aliter quam Jura volunt
Curia tenta in pretorio burgi de abirdene per ballivos eiusdem xviij die octobris anno supradicto

Quo die patricius baxtar et thomas gardnar' accusati de infrictione ponderis
panis eisdem deliberat' posuerunt se in voluntate prepositi et ballivorum vnde ipsorum
quilibet adiudicatur in amerciamento curie

Alexander litl inuenit Willelmum hay plegium legalem quod Symon crafurd et pars sua erunt indempnes
de eo et parte sua aliter quam per viam Juris Et eodemmodo alexander hay deuenit plegium pro dicto Simone

Eodem die Johannes Daw conuictus per assisam adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta pertur
bacione et lesione clementis naute et tenetur emendare parti lese ad visum proborum
Et idem clemens in amerciamento quia perturbavit dictum Johannem / et emendabit vt Jura volunt

Alexander sanchar' deuenit plegius legalis pro Johanne Daw magistro cuiusdam nauis de leith et pro nautis
suis quod Johannes sandirson magister nauis de swethin et naute eiusdem erunt indempnes
aliter quam per viam Juris

Item andreas Kympty deuenit plegius legalis pro Johanne schawpynsa de indempnitate dicti Johannis sandir
son' et nautarum eius aliter quam Jura volunt

Thomas prat et gilbertus vaus deuenerunt plegij legales pro dicto magistro
nauis de swethin et nautis suis quod Johannes Daw / naute eiusdem et Johannes schaw
pynsa et pars sua erunt indempnes aliter quam per viam Juris

The samen dai the aldirman and consale has ordanyt that Sym of crafurd sal pay
til alexander rede xlvij s' betuix this and mononday next tocum quhilkis he ressauit
fra the said alexander for twa opin or than to fynd him souerty towarrand him the
said opin and tokepe him scaithles of al manis clame / And eftir the fourm of the
said deliuerence alexander hay incontinent becom souerty for the said Sym for pay
ment of the said some' or ellis tokepe him scaithles of the clame of ony person'
or personis of the samyn opin

Curia tenta in pretorio burgi de abirdene per prepositum et balliuos eiusdem xxjo die octobris
anno Dominj et cetera lxxxijdo

quo die subscripti electi fuerunt in Inquisicionem videlicet Dauid
symson' gilbertus vaus Willelmus blindsel thomas prat andreas culan adam androson'
alexander hay Dauid mathoson' Willelmus hay gilbertus morison' Johannes glenmalvin
Robertus prat Willelmus de tulidef andreas murray senior et Johannes symson' burgenses dicti burgi
Quj Jurati dicunt quod quondam thomas malison' frater Willelmi malisone latoris presencium obiit
ad pacem et fidem domini nostri Regis sed non vltimo vestitus et sasitus vt de feodo de aliquibus
terris aut annuis redditibus infra burgum de abirdene per dictum Willelmum malisson' petitis
et clamatis Et quam dictus Willelmus est legittimus et propinquior heres eiusdem quondam Thome fratris
suj sed non de aliquibus terris aut annuis redditibus ut predictis clamatis / et quod est legittime
etatis et cetera

Eodem die decretum fuit per curiam et datum pro Judicio per os thome talyour Judicatoris curie
quod alexander richardson' est in amerciamento curie pro iniusta detencione xxiiijor solidorum ab andrea
lowson' et quod tenetur satisfacere eidem infra terminum Juris quia defecit in probacione
solucionis eorundem isto die eidem peremptorie assignat'

Item eodem die magister Kennacus sutherland procurator et eo nomine Johannis chavmer
burgensis de elgyne inuenit in manu philippo Dunbrek seriendi quod alexander chamer
vnius seriandorum huius burgi iniuste detinet a dicto Johanne duas barellas salmonum aut precium
earundum videlicet l s' pro qualibet barella preter x s' inde per dictum alexandrum solut'
quj quidem alexander pecijt diem legalem ad respondendum et ballivi assignauerunt eidem hodie ad quindenam

The samyn day be the decret of the court Dauid Kyntor was ordanit til answer'
this day xv daies to the borgh strekin on him be James coming for the wrang
wis intrometting with a thrid part / of a net of the pot wattir at his awn' hand but
assedacion of the said James

Item the samen dai Thomas of fife ane of the ballies of this burgh tuke a dis
tres fra alexander the hay for xlvij s' for the quhilkis he becom souerty til alexander
rede for Sym of crafurd / for the price of twa oxin / And the said alexander hay askit
his distres toborgh quhilk was deliuerit til him in Jugement tomak payment
within xv dais of the said some' til alexander rede or his procuratouris And the said alexander
rede has constitute his wife procuratour til ask and ressaue that som' in his absence

the assise has ordanit that gilbert of chavmer sal deliuer til patrik andirson his
spvne and ressaue v s' / and that the said patrik sal deliuer til gilbert of chamer
his pan / the quhilkis v s' patrik andirson' deliuerit incontinent til gilbert of chamer

Adam andirson and Johne stevinsone has summyttit thaim apon al debatis and clamys
til Robert blindsel aldirman thomas fife James cummyng twa of the ballies and to
John' Wormot quhilkis beand sworn sal determyn and end thaim as law wil
eftir thare knaulagis / and the partiez ar' oblist til vndirly thare ordinance

Joneta chavmer primo die vocata ad sectam Willelmi de tulidef prout post per cedulam direct'
super porrectione plegij non comparuit / quare precipitur seriando quod capto districto ab eadem ipsam
summoneat ad quindenam tanquam secundum diem placiti

Curia tenta in pretorio burgi de abirdene per ballivos eiusdem quarto die nouembris anno
Domini et cetera lxxxij /

quo die alexander prat conuictus per assisam adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro
iniusta perturbacione margrete stil et tenetur emendare ad visum proborum
Et quia reperiebatur quod dictam margreta excessit contra dictum alexandrum in verbis maliciosis et iniurio
sis / assisa ordinavit quod si ammodo inueniatur delinquare contra eundem in talibus maliciosis verbis
dabit xx s' ad fabricam beati nicholai

Eodem die Joneta chavmer secundo die vocata ad sectam Willelmi de tulidef / non comparuit Ideo precipitur
moricio besat seriando capere districtum et cetera et premunire eandem ad xvnam tanquam tercium diem processus

Item eodem die magister Kennacus suthirland procurator et eo nomine Johannis chavmer burgensis de
elgyn calumpniavit Duncanum talyour de iniusta detencione sex marcarum et ix s' a dicto Johanne
qui quidem Duncanus peciit diem legalem ad respondendum et ballivi assignauerunt eidem hodie ad quindenam

The samen dai Alexander rede Dauid menyes John Wormot gilbert the vaus Johne the
vaus' gilbert chamer William blindsel Dauid mathoson alexander marr' matho culan James
craik Richart hil and Johne symson chosin and sworn in ane assise with consent of partiez
within writin / and Riply avisit / fand and deliuerit Dauid Kyntor quyte of the wrang
wis' intrometting with a thrid part / of a net of the pot wattir / wpon the quhilk James
cuming folowit him be a borgh

the vj dai of nouembre yer' et cetera lxxxij the ballies has ordanit that ane officiar' sal ger
warn Janet annand tocomper' in the court of the burgh on mononday cum xv dais
toanswer' to the borgh strekin on hir be Dauid clerk for the wrangwis' halding of
xvij s' fra him to gude compt and rekning for certane malt
Curia tenta in pretorio de abirdene per ballivos eiusdem viij die nouembris anno et cetera lxxxij

quo die subscrip
ti electi fuerunt in assisam videlicet Dauid symson alexander rede gilbertus vaus Johannes vaus Willelmus
blindsel Jacobus craik andreas murray senior Robertus prat gilbertus leche thomas culan et Willelmus
andirson / quj Jurati continuarunt et posuerunt in dilacione actionem prosecut' per Willelmum garuiach contra et
aduersus Willelmum de tulidef de iniusta detencione ij li' g' ad bonum compotum vsque diem martis xijum
diem instantis mensis defectu comparencie alexandri de marr'

Wil andirson Wat thomson and Donald strathachin deponit be thare athis in presence of
the said assise / that thai saw and herd Wil of garuiach cum to Wil of tulidef and ask
at him his part of the gold and blak money / and that Wil of tulidef offerit til him
blak money declarand til him that he had na gold togif him
Curia tenta in pretorio burgi de abirdene per ballivos eiusdem xiijo die nouembris anno predicto

The quhilk dai the breif of Inquest purchest be ser John' of ruthirfurd knycht
lachful procuratour til androw Kynninmond son and ayr of vmquhile John' of Kyn
inmond burges of this burgh is continuit with consent of party to the law day of this
burgh eftir yule next tocum / the same breif hafand the samyn force strinth
and effect that day as this day

the samen dai Androw murray eldar be his forspekar' William blindsele strekit a
borgh in the hand of philp of Dunbrek seriand / that Ranald talyour haldis wrang
wisly fra him xix li' et x s' til gude compt and rekning as he that com det
tour' til him for iij flescharis et cetera and the said Ranald askit a lachful day
til answer' to the borch' And the ballies assignit til him mononday cum viij dais
and becaus' that dai is haly t fife balye has warnit him tocompere on tusday the xxvj dai of nouembre

In curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio xiiijto die nouembris anno quo supra / Willelmus de fivy conuictus per
assisam amerciatur pro perturbio Johannis glenmalvin filius Et idem / Johannes in amerciamento pro iniusta perturbacione et
lesione dictj Willelmi / Et quia reperiebatur quod idem Willelmus dedit occasionem perturbij / Assisa or
dinavit eundem deliberare j libr' cere ad missam Sancti sanguinis

The samen dai comperit before the ballies in Jugement Johne baxtar son' and ayr of
vmquhile patrik baxtar burges of abirdene / and Renuncit owyrgef and quytclamit
til Thomas prat al richt and clame of rycht propirty and possession' that he had
or mycht haf in and to a waist land with the pertinens liand in the schipraw betuix
the land of thom quhite on the south part / and the land of alexander chamer on the
north part / recoverit be the said thomas be lauchful process' in defaute of
payment of certane annuel / And attour the said Johne of his awn' fre wil and
motife nocht choackit nor circumuenyt / renuncit cassit and adnullit / al charteris
euidentis lettres of sesyne and documentis concernand the said land for him his ayris
and assignais for evyr / and specialy certane lettres and euidentis beand in the handis
of James lesly as he allegit quhilkis he askit and couth nocht get / becaus'
the said thomas prat / has put him prentys' til Robert scheresmyth for
aucht yeris and payt him ane certane some' of money tharfor as the said
robert grantit / and for vthir gret help and supple done til him be the said tho
mas as in the instrument tane tharupon in the handis of ser Johne striuelin notar
mare fullely is contenit / witnes her'of thomas fife alexander of chavmer Johne
the Waus thre of the ballies gilbert the vaus William blindsel Johne of
glenmalvin philp of Dunbrek seriand and vthiris diuers'

Curia tenta in pretorio burgi de Abirdene per ballivos eiusdem xviij die nouembris anno
Dominj et cetera lxxxij /

quo die subscripti electi fuerunt in Inquisicionem videlicet gilbertus vaus Johannes
vaus Johannes Wormot andreas murra senior Ricardus hil gilbertus morison Willelmus hay gilbertus leche
Willelmus de tulidef Willelmus andirson Johannes symson

Eodem die Joneta chavmer tercio die vocata ad sectam Willelmi de tulidef super plegio inuento in manibus Dun
canj straloch seriandi / quod dicta Joneta tenetur liberare ipsum Willelmum tanquam plegium gilberto leche pro
Relicta quondam Johannis tulidef nuper defuncta de firma domus quam dicta relicta habuit de dicto
gilberto / pro eo quod eadem Joneta remouebat dictam relictam et omnia bona sua ad eadem domo / vel quod
apportaret et restauraret dictam domum et fundum eiusdem cum huiusmodi bonis / Non comparuit Ideo precipitur secundo
capere districtum et cetera et premunire eandem ad quindenam tanquam quartum et peremptorem diem processus

Item eodem die magister Kennacus suthirland procurator et eo nomine Johannis chavmer burgensis de el
gyne prosecutus fuit Duncanum talyour de iniusta detencione sex marcarum et ix s' a dicto
Johanne / quo negan' posit' fuit ad assisam suprascripta / que mature auisata delibe
rauit et decreuit eundem Duncanum quitum et absolutum de iniusta detencione dicte summe

Item ballivi assignauerunt gilberto morison et Johanni vaus hodie ad quindenam ad respondendum secte andree
vaus fratris dicti Johannis pro iniusta detencione ix marcarum per dictum gilbertum et xl solidorum per dictum Johannem
Thomas de culan adiudicatur in amerciamento pro iniusta detencione disci stannei a Jacobo cummyn'

The xxj dai of nouember yer' forsaid / before the ballies in Jugement / ser Archibald
of caldirwod vicar' of northberwik / has fundin Adam andirson' souerty to do that
law wil til ony party havand clame til a barrel of hvny beand in Johne
Dawsonis schip and ordanit tobe deliuerit to the said vicar'

The samyn day in the court before the ballies Sandris fynlaw grantit that he had pavn
dit a siluer peis' of Johne Wormotis til Johne of lammynton' for xl s' and na mare / the
quhilk peis' the said John' of lammynton' declarit that he pawndit til Dauid Kintor
for the said som' of xl s' and for na mare

patricius andirson et Johannes andirson filius conuicti per assisam amerciatur pro perturbacione adinuicem
et emendabit alter alteri ad visum proborum / plegii legali andrea branche / pro dicto patricio / et pro
dicto Johanne Willelmus hay deuenit plegius / quod vtraque pars erit indempnis aliter quam per viam Juris

Item becaus' the assise fand that thom of narne excedit in iniurious' word til alexander howi
sone and Walter achneve / quhilkis complenyit of strublance / thai haf ordanit him to pay to the kirk
j li' of wax / And gif he beis convict / of siclike offence of thaim or ony vthir nychtbur'
in tym cuming topay xl s' to the kirk wark / the partijs beand oblist to stand to the ordinan
ce of the assise before thare deliuerence

In the court haldin in the tolbuthe of abirdene be the ballies of that ilk the xxij dai of no
uembre yer' et cetera lxxxij / gilbert leche folowit meg of strathachin seruitour til thomas rolland
be a borch' of the wrangwis' intrometting with certane gudis of his sic as curchis and / the
said meg be hir forspekar and maistir / thomas rolland denyit al wrangwis' intrometting with
ony gudis of the said gilbertis and referrit hir to the knaulage of ane assise of wor
the sworn burgez . quhilk assise riply avisit / fand and declarit / the said meg
quyte of the wrangwis' intrometting of ony gudis of the said gilbert lechis / and of his
clame of the samyn

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem xxvjto die nouembris
anno Dominj supradicto /

quo die Ranaldus talyour primo die vocatus ad sectam Andree murray senioris
pro iniusta detencione xix librarum et x solidorum ad bonum compotum tanquam debitor pro tribus carnifi
cibus / non comparuit Idea precipitur philippo Dunbrek seriando capere districtum et cetera premunire eundem ad
proximam curiam legalem tanquam secundum diem processus

The samyn dai it was fundin and deliuerit be ane sworn assise William blindsel forspekar of the sam
that Stevin giffard suld content and pay til gilbert Waus four' s' g' within terme of law / be
caus' of ten s' scottis tane and resauit be the said Stevin fra Johne mewson on the said
gilbertis behalf / wpon the quhilk deliuerence the said Stevin askit testimoniale
vndir the Seil of thomas fife or John' the vaus twa of the balyeis than sittand in Juge
ment / that sic a some' is optenit apon him sen he has pait the said some til the said
Johne mewson' of x s' scottis as he allegis

The samen dai Thomas fife and Johne the vaus twa of the ballies of this burgh
Rehersit / that apon Sonday the xxiiij day of this instant moneth of nouembre In presence
of thaim / Dauid menyes alexander rede thomas prat Wat of achneve and vthiris Johne sym
son' burges of abirdene was oblist and promittit to Johne low burges of the said burgh'
toware til him ten s' g' in blak holmys fustian' in his viage now in flandris
in John' sandirsonis schip callit erasmus of swethin becaus' of xxv s' scottis that the
said Johne low has content and pait for him til gilbert morison for the stereman that
passit in the said schip / and that the said John' symson' sal awnter the said fustian quhare
he awnteris him self
Curia tenta in pretorio burgi de abirdene per ballivos eiusdem secundo die Decembris anno et cetera lxxxij

The quhilk dai thomas prat deliuerit til thom of culan and Johne of glenmalvin the son'
apon the common kist ten s' scottis tobe pait for him to the skippar of the hulk / for the
quhilk x s' the saidis thomas of culan and Johne glenmalvin ar becumin dettouris / toger the
skippar allow j cron' in his fracht

the sammyn day gilbert of chavmer convict be ane assise was adiugit in amerciament
for the wrangwis' strublance of alexander rede in word clamand the said gilbert of
j merk of his wattir mail acht to the toune / the quhilk merke the assise findis he suld
pay like as it was ordanit be ane assise tharupon of before / and the said alexander
quyte of strublance of the said gilbert et cetera

Curia legalis tenta per balliuos burgi de Abirdene in pretorio eiusdem ixo die Decembris
anno Dominj supradicto /

quo die Andreas Waus super quem gilbertus Vaus' porrexit plegium
pro iniusta detencione trium petrarum et vnius quarterij lane et v solidorum argenti / primo die vocatus
ad respondendum dicto plegio Non comparuit Ideo precipitur moricio besat seriendo capere districtum et cetera
premunire eundem andream ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam secundum diem processus

Eodem die Ranaldus talyour secundo die vocatus ad sectam Andree murray senioris pro iniusta detencione
xix librarum et x solidorum ad bonum compotum vt patet in act' preceden' non comparuit / quare precipitur philippo Dunbrek
seriendo capere districtum et cetera et premunire dictum Ranuldum ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam tercium diem processus

Item eodem die Willelmus cummyng scissor adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta detencione xij solidorum
et iij denariorum ab Agnete vxore Johannis fichet prout compertum fuit per assisam / et ad satisfaciendum
eedem de dicta summa infra terminum Juris

Elena propinatrix Willelmi moyses per concessionem propriam Nicholaius baxtar Janeta annand vxor
Roberti Kintor thomas gardner ex parte vxoris sue et vxor murthaci glenmalvin conuicti per
assisam amerciantur pro infrictione assise ceruisie vendendo pro xij d'

Item eodem die Jacobus de Kintor plegius Willelmi troup super quem Donaldus sclater inuenit
plegium in manu Duncanj straloch seriandi pro iniusta detencione xij solidorum argenti et vnius le galt
etatis vnius annj / primo die vocatus Ad intrandum eundem Willelmum responsurus dicto plegio / non comparuit / Ideo
precipitur seriendo capere districtum de dicto Jacobo plegio et cetera et premunire eum ad comparere faciendum
dictum Willelmum ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam secundum diem processus

The samen dai before the balyeis in Jugement / thom fynlaw in Deir' has fundin
Androw norvel souerty for him topay til Robert of buchan or his wif al dettis that
thai may lauchfully optene apon him And in like wise Robert of buchanis wif has
fundin John' malisson souerty for his husband and hir tocontent the said thom fynlau al
dettis that he recoveris laufully of thaim or ony of thaim / And the said thom fynlau
be his awn' grant sal deliuer til Robert of buchanis wif j bol of meil betuix this
and Wphaliday next tocum

In the court haldin in the tolbuthe of abirdene Thomas fife and Johne the vaus twa
of the ballies of the samen the xiij day of Decembre yer' of god et cetera lxxxij / comperit be
fore the balliez in Jugement Thomas benyn litstar and grantit him awand til Androw
Wenton' foure pundis of vsual money of Scotland til gude count / and rekning / And
for souerty of the payment of the said some' / the said thomas bening has resignit his
land liand within the said burgh in the balyeis handis be the giffing of his bonet
tobe sald and demanyt as law wil for the payment of the said four' li' tobe
made betuix this and the feist of Witsonday next tocum failyeand of the pay
ment of the said some' at the said feist of Witsonday / before thir witnes gilbert
vaus William blindsel gilbert morisone William giffard Duncan straloch and morice
besat twa of the seriandis with vthir diuers'
Curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio de abirdene per ballivos eiusdem xvj die Decembris anno supradicto

The same dai the assise fand and ordanit / that patrik stiklaw sal fulfil the decrete
of certane arbritouris made betuix him and James craik vndir the subscripcion of gilbert
morisonis hand eftir the tenour of the samyn
Ricardus Wrycht and thomas cathkyn posuerunt se in voluntate ballivorum pro perturbio adinuicem
Johannes litstar ex parte vxoris sue et vxor Roberti Kyntor amerciantur pro propinacione ceruisie xij denariorum

Item the said dai philp of Dunbrek seriand declarit that he had present in the merket tosel iij
merket dais ane caldroun of Robert clubis quhilk was tane in a distres for xxxiij
s' acht til William of tulidef / and that it was prisit the ferd merket day be Ranald talyour
Wil nory and george broun tharto sworn to ij s' the galloun
Curia legalis tenta in pretorio burgi de abirdene per ballivos eiusdem xxiijo die Decembris anno predicto

quo die Ranaldus talyour tercio die vocatus ad sectam andree murray senioris non comparuit Ideo precipitur alexandro
chamer seriando capere districtum et cetera et premunire eundem Ranaldum ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam quartum et
peremptorem diem huius processus

Eodem die marioria giffard super quam Willelmus hay inuenit plegium pro iniusta detencione vnius singuli
argentati pro quo soluta est primo die vocatus ad respondendum non comparuit Ideo precipitur alexandro chamer seriando
capere districtum octo solidorum de dicta marioria et cetera et premunire eandem ad proximam curiam le
galem tanquam secundum diem processus

Eodem die Jacobus de Kintor plegius Willelmi troup secundo die vocatus ad intrandum eundem Willelmum ad
sectam Donaldi sclatar ut patet in rotulamento primi diei processus / non comparuit / Ideo precipitur Duncano straloch
seriando capere districtum de dicto plegio et cetera et premunire eundem ad comparere faciendum dictum Willelmum
ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam tercium diem processus

Item eodem die Ranaldus talyour postquam vocatus fuit ad sectam andree murray senioris / comparuit post exitum
dicti andree de curia ballivis tunc in eadem curia protribunali sedentibus / et optulit se parat' ad sectam
dicti andree / quo non comparens extendit plegium idem Ranaldus in manu philippi Dunbrek seriandi quod quitus
fuit a calumpnia prefati andree donec nouiter fuerit attachiamentus

Curia tenta in pretorio burgi de Abirdene per ballivos eiusdem tercio die mensis Januarij anno Domini
mo iiijcmo lxxxijdo

quo die subscripte braciatrices conuicte per assisam amerciantur pro infrictione communis
ordinacionis in propinacione ceruisie xij denariorum videlicet Relicta quondam thome alanson vxor Johannis talyour
apud brade guttir vxor Walteri pyot vxor Roberti Kintor vxor Ade crafurd vxor Johannis catnes
vxor Antonij hatmakar vxor Willelmi rate vxor Alexandri coule vxor Johannis lundoris vxor Alexandri logy
vxor Andree goldsmyth vxor Johannis Durwart Ebota Innes vxor Walteri mernys vxor Andree
branche vxor thome gradner vxor Alexandri coupar vxor Johannis fichet vxor gilberti vaus vxor phi
lippi de Dunbrek vxor Johannis sincler' vxor Nicholai baxtar vxor Willelmi moyses vxor Willelmi
malisson Relicta Ade cardny vxor Andree rettre margreta hig vxor Alexandri talyour vxor
alexandri Westland vxor fynlai fores Willelmus modan vxor Andree ancroft

Assisa Johannes colison alexander howison Dauid symson gilbertus vaus Johannes vaus thomas prat
Willelmus blindsel alexander trail Robertus prat Alexander nachti magnus Wormot alexander sanchar' et
Donaldus strathachin The quhilk assise the gret aith sworn and riply avisit has
deliuerit / that the ayrschip clamyt be William malisson brudir germane and ayr til
vmquhile Thomas malissone in sa fer as is contenit in a letter made vndir the said
thomas Seil to Johne malissone his sone tharupon / is of vail and pertenis of reson'
to the said Johne / And in sa fer as Dauid menyes forspekar' for the said William
malisson allegit tomak gude that the said thomas malisson had gudis the
tyme of his distres' of his awne vndisponyt / the assise has assignit mo
nunday cum xv dais to the said William and his forspekar' tomak gude / quhat
gudis the said thomas had in the tym of his distres' that beand made gude
The assise fyndis that the said William salhaf ayrschip of the saidis gudis

In curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio burgi de abirdene per ballivos eiusdem viijo die Januarij anno quo supra
Thomas prat inuenit plegium super Dauid symson de iniusta detencione xlvij s' et vj d' ab eo
et dictus Dauid peciit diem legalem ad respondendum dicto plegio / et curia assignauit eidem diem
lune ad quindenam

Eodem die prepositus assignauit henrico rede commorans in Kyncorth diem lune ad xvnam ad respondendum ple
gio super eundem inuento per Johannem de Knollis pro iniusta detencione trium barellarum salmonum ab eo
plegio Alexandro rede pro introitu eiusdem henrici dicto die

The samen dai the actione movit betuix Androw branche on the ta part / and thom of marr' on the
tothir part / anent compt and rekning of ten barellis of salmond clamit be the said androw was put til
ane asise / the quhilk assise deliueris / that the said thom of marr' sal ger the said Androw or
his procuratours be payt in the feyr' at the erast schippis passand furth of abirdene or
ony vthir port of Scotland oute of the handis of copsymondsonis wif or cornelis hir sone
of thre li' g' xij s' g' and iiij g' / And failyeand that the said copsymondsonis wif or hir
sone cornelis pais nocht the said some til the said androw or his procuratouris / than the said
thomas sal content and pay til the said Androw his ayris executouris or assignais alsmekil for ilke
li' g' of scottis money as ony beis borowit on the rais' in faute of payment within xl
dais next eftir that certificacion cum fra the feyr that the said some' is vnpait Alsua
supersedit / the assise fyndis and deliueris
Curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio de abirdene xo die Januarij anno Dominj et cetera lxxxij /

quo die Johannes chamer
per prelocutorem suum Willelmum blindsel inuenit plegium super Alexandrum prat carnificem de iniusta detencione quatuor
librarum et iij solidorum ab eodem quj quidem alexander per andream branche prelocutorem suum negavit dictum debitum et sic
huiusmodi actio posita fuit ad assisam / que ordinavit quod dictus alexander prat quj allegavit se soluisse dic
tam summam probabit sufficienter in curia huius burgi quod dicta summa est per eum soluta dicto Johanni chaumer
ut prescribitur Sinautem satisfaciet eidem Johanni de dicta summa infra terminum Juris / vnde assignatur
dicto alexandro crastina dies pro dicta probacionem producenda Et quia andreas branche asseruit se audiuisse re
lat' per quatuor personas quod dicta summa fuit legittime soluta Willelmus blindsel prelocutor nomine quo supra
protestabatur quod deposicio talium personarum non preiiudicaret preiudicaret dicto Johanni penes dictam causam / Et prefatus Johannes chamer
constituit Willelmum blindsel et andream Wenton' procuratores suos coniunctim et divisim ad agendum et defendendum
pro eo in dicta causa Ipso promittens de Rato

The assise deliueris and ordanis that Richert of bernys sal content and pay to Johne of balcromby
xxix s' g' v g' an demj as the said Richert lent siluer in flandris eftir the tenor of the obligacion
made be a man of edinburgh to the said richart tharupon

Iniungitur Andree branche ad respondendum plegio super eum porrecto per thomam marr' pro iniusta deten
cione xxx solidorum pro naulo / die lune ad octo dies ut Jura volunt

Dominus Johannes de ruthirfurd miles inuenit thomam marr' plegium legalem quod Alexander forbes et pars sua erunt
indempnes pro eo et parte sua aliter quam per viam Juris Et Andreas branche deuenit plegius legalis pro alexandro forbes
quod dictus dominus Johannes et pars sua erunt indempnes pro eo et parte sua aliter quam Jura volunt
